sentence.Network_en: His response to attacks on his work was chiefly bewilderment.
sentence.Network_cn: 听到别人对自己工作的指责，他的反应主要是困惑。

sentence.Network_en: He shook his head in bewilderment.
He was in great [ complete ] bewilderment at the sight.
sentence.Network_cn: 他看到这种情景,被完全弄糊涂了.

entry.def: Bewilderment is the feeling of being bewildered.

example.ex: He shook his head in bewilderment.

means.word_mean: 1. confusion resulting from failure to understand
